name: FARIBAULT GRAY TRAPPER THROW
description:
- 100% fluff loomed merino wool 
- 50"x72" 
- Machine wash/dry

A modern take on our classic Revival blanket. That timeless pattern is now expressed in a palate of contemporary hues. The Trapper throw employs a raw-cut “leno” edge. With the appearance of an unfinished edge, it’s the natural felting of our wool that keeps the fibers properly in place. Made from 100% fluff-loomed fine merino wool.

options.name: Faribault Gray Trapper Throw

name: FARIBAULT WOOL CABIN BLANKET
description:
- 100% merino wool 
- Machine wash, line dry
- Gray, Blue, Red

The cabin is an American vestige of family and relaxation. It follows, then, that we make a blanket with that image in mind.
Inspired by a vintage photo of the cabin scene, we crafted our wool cabin blanket to be showcased prominently in the home, either as a full bedspread or for relaxation in the living room. The colors are always vibrant and the wool is always soft to the touch.

options.name: Throw, 66x96 inches, Cabin Blanket
